languages.text: "Это недостойное поведение для Вольного Торговца — отказать в помощи слугам закона".
"It is poor form for a Rogue Trader to refuse to help servants of the law."
languages.original_text: "Это недостойное поведение для Вольного Торговца — отказать в помощи слугам закона".

traits.locale_text: "It is poor form for a Rogue Trader to refuse to help servants of the law."
"It is poor form for a Rogue Trader to refuse to help servants of the law."
"It is poor form for a Rogue Trader to refuse to help servants of the law."
"It is poor form for a Rogue Trader to refuse to help servants of the law."
"It is poor form for a Rogue Trader to refuse to help servants of the law."

languages.text: «No estaría bien visto que un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente se negara a ayudar a los sirvientes de la ley».
languages.original_text: "It is poor form for a Rogue Trader to refuse to help servants of the law."

traits.locale_text: «No estaría bien visto que un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente se negara a ayudar a los sirvientes de la ley».

languages.text: “身为行商浪人，居然拒绝帝国律法的执行者，这可真不像话。”
languages.original_text: "It is poor form for a Rogue Trader to refuse to help servants of the law."

traits.locale_text: “身为行商浪人，居然拒绝帝国律法的执行者，这可真不像话。”

languages.text: « Il serait malvenu de la part d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} de refuser son aide à des serviteurs de la loi. »
languages.original_text: "It is poor form for a Rogue Trader to refuse to help servants of the law."

traits.locale_text: « Il serait malvenu de la part d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} de refuser son aide à des serviteurs de la loi. »

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーが法の従者を助けることを拒むのは、評判を損ねる行為だ」
languages.original_text: "It is poor form for a Rogue Trader to refuse to help servants of the law."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーが法の従者を助けることを拒むのは、評判を損ねる行為だ」

languages.text: "Bir Hür Tacir'in kanunların hizmetkârlarına yardım etmeyi reddetmesi kötü bir davranıştır."
languages.original_text: "It is poor form for a Rogue Trader to refuse to help servants of the law."

traits.locale_text: "Bir Hür Tacir'in kanunların hizmetkârlarına yardım etmeyi reddetmesi kötü bir davranıştır."

languages.text: "{mf|Ein Freihändler|Eine Freihändlerin} sollte sich nicht weigern, Gesetzesdienern zu helfen."
languages.original_text: "It is poor form for a Rogue Trader to refuse to help servants of the law."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Ein Freihändler|Eine Freihändlerin} sollte sich nicht weigern, Gesetzesdienern zu helfen."
